title: Start
body:
<<moveRight Camila 50 30 >>
<<moveUp Mari 10 50 >>
<<moveRight Mari 10 50>>
<<moveLeft Camila 1 1>>
<<pauseFor Mari 1>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mari>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Camila>>
<<moveRight Mari 15 125>>
<<moveLeft Mari 10 90>>
Girl 1: You can't guard me!
<<moveLeft Camila 15 125>>
<<moveRight Camila 10 90>>
Girl 2: Take that!
<<moveRight Mari 15 120>>
<<moveLeft Mari 10 90>>
<<moveLeft Camila 15 125>>
<<moveRight Camila 10 90>>
<<moveLeft Mari 30 50>>
<<moveLeft Mari 35 40>>
Girl 1: Ahhhhhh!
<<moveLeft Camila 61 120>>
Girl 2: I've got you Mari!
<<moveRight Mari 5 20>>
<<moveRight Camila 10 20>>
Mari: *huff*...Camila, you got me...
Camila: Of course I did! It wouldn't be as fun to win if you got a broken arm!
<<moveRight Mari 3 30>>
<<moveLeft Camila 3 30>>
<<pauseFor Mari 1>>
<<moveRight Camila 8 30>>
Camila: Ok, that's enough fencing for now.
Mari: Yeah, I'm hungry!
